description:
New explicit sync support has been merged into wlroots, a Wayland compositor library, promising enhanced graphics handling to all Sway users.

The post Wlroots Finally Gets Explicit Sync Integration appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Wlroots Finally Gets Explicit Sync Integration

description:
libcurl, the popular multi-protocol file transfer library, is 24 years old. Discover its journey from 2000 to becoming a foundation of internet communication.

The post libcurl Turns 24: A Look Back at the Journey appeared first on Linux Today.
title: libcurl Turns 24: A Look Back at the Journey

description:
The popular source code editor Sublime Text 4’s latest build rolls out new tools for developers, fixes, and improved features for Mac, Windows, and Linux users.

The post Sublime Text 4 Build 4180 Brings Fixes Across All Platforms appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Sublime Text 4 Build 4180 Brings Fixes Across All Platforms

description:
Managing a RHEL server, as is the case with any other Linux server, will require that you know how to add, edit, suspend, or delete user accounts and grant users the necessary permissions to files, directories, and other system resources to perform their assigned tasks.

The post How to Manage Users and Groups in RHEL appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Manage Users and Groups in RHEL

description:
Samba is an effective tool for sharing files and printers across networks, particularly in mixed environments with Windows and Linux systems. In this guide, I will explain to you how to install and configure Samba in Ubuntu so you can share folders across your network.

The post How to Install and Configure Samba in Ubuntu appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install and Configure Samba in Ubuntu
